talk.abstract:
Demonstration of some of the best Python console applications written
using Urwid:

* bpython-urwid
* videotop
* alot
* turses
* hachoir-urwid
* speedometer
* pudb
talk.bio: Ian Ward is the author of Urwid and a number of other open source Python projects.  See http://excess.org/ for more information.
talk.description:

talk.name: Console Applications with Urwid
talk.title: Console Applications with Urwid
